org.deeplearning4j.text.invertedindex

Interface InvertedIndex<T extends SequenceElement>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LuceneInvertedIndex

    public interface InvertedIndex<T extends SequenceElement>
extends java.io.Serializable
    An inverted index for mapping words to documents and documents to words
